page.title: 20LEGENDS AND FOLKLORE.
page.content: {The hound of Whitmore.Lyzanne Poole:11 Over a century ago people believed a{ {Hound}roamed the moors of{Whitmore.} The{Hound}had shaggy black hair and green glowing eyes,anybody that met the{Hound}was sure to be killed.If people wanted to cross the park lands,they would have company.If they went alone they would sing or whistle to keep the spirits away. {Penny Park House Alison Whateley:10 {Penny Park House}is one of the oldest buildings in the North of{Coventry. Its age and situation connect it with several local legends.It used to a farmhouse with outbuildings and one or two cottages.In one lived{Old Mother {Beebee.}She could not read or write but she was considered wise.Four centurys ago{Edward Broome}was hanged in the barn.His ghost and that of his dog haunt{Whitmore Park.
